name: Lost and found (Mashi)
description:
You lost something important to you in a weird place filled with weird people and loads of water... You must get it back! But what's up with all that water?

Controls: arrow keys

2 main endings and a secret one! +Multiple dialogue versions if you absolutely hate picking up items.

Made using Bitsy. Music (made with beepbox) can be found at: https://soundcloud.com/ma_shi/lost-and-found
